settings.heading: When will my order ship?
settings.content: Orders are typically shipped within one to two business days (Monday- Friday). Orders are not shipped on weekends. During times of high order volume, please allow up to 5 business days for your order to ship.

settings.heading: What if my package is missing?
settings.content:
If you added Brave Little Ones Package Protection at checkout then do not worry! Our package protection offers peace of mind for all of your orders. If you added the insurance, your package is fully protected in the event that it is lost, damaged, or stolen. Exclusions apply.

See Brave Little Ones Package Protection Guarantee for more.

settings.mainText: We offer FREE shipping on all United States orders over $40.

settings.heading: Where do you ship to?
settings.content: We use a service called Passport Shipping which delivers to over 200 countries. Click here to learn more.

settings.heading: What is the service you use?
settings.content:
Passport Shipping is a modern shipping carrier that helps direct-to-consumer brands ship their products internationally. They will be your main go-to for all questions once our products leave the warehouse.

Please message them at help@passportshipping.com for any questions regarding your order.

settings.heading: Why does it cost what it costs?
settings.content: There is a shipping cost and a duties and taxes cost. We default to each country's laws when it comes to covering duties and taxes upfront or upon receipt. Please note that Brave Little Ones is not responsible for re-shipping a package if duties and taxes are unpaid and it impedes delivery.

settings.heading: When can I expect my package?
settings.content: Estimated shipping is 13-15 business days but could take less or more time. If your package is lost or you have any issues with your package help@passportshipping.com is your best contact for all questions.

settings.heading: I need help with my tracking!
settings.content:
There are three places to find your tracking number:

Confirmation email

We will notify you 1-3 days after your order that your package is shipping. That email will have your unique tracking number.

Junk or spam email 

If you didn’t get an email, please check your junk/spam folder just in case it’s there.

Passport can help!

If you still can’t find it, get in touch with Passport at help@passportshipping.com.

settings.heading: I want to return my order
settings.content: We do not accept returns on international orders at this time.

settings.heading: More questions?
settings.content: Passport has detailed FAQs here

settings.mainText: We offer shipping to over 200 countries across the globe!

settings.heading: How do I start an exchange?
settings.content:
We’re sorry your purchase didn’t work out. We allow exchanges within 30 days. All items applicable for exchange must be unwashed, unworn and in original condition. Product must have the original packaging with tags. A store credit will be issued within 3 days after return is received. $6.99 will be deducted from your store credit for the return shipping label. Please use a poly mailer or bubble envelope to return items. Additional fees may apply for returning items in large boxes.

Start a Return

settings.mainText: We’re sorry your purchase didn’t work out. We allow exchanges within 30 days for U.S. orders only.

settings.heading: Our Guarantee
settings.content:
Brave Little Ones Package Protection offers you peace of mind and package protection for all of your orders. If you add insurance, your package is fully protected in the event that it is lost, damaged, or stolen.

Our Brave Little Ones $0.98 Package Protection guarantees delivery on all orders placed within the United States.

You are eligible to file a claim if any of the following criteria apply:

- Your package states delivered but has not been received, and it has been 5+ days since marked delivered.

- Your tracking/package has not moved in 15+ days.

- Your product arrives damaged, you have 5 business days to file a claim. Pictures must be provided.

In the event that your Brave Little Ones package is lost, damaged, or stolen we will reship your items if they are in stock. If items are not in stock, we will issue you a shop credit for the amount of the original purchase.

If you’re eligible to file a Package Protection Claim, please email us at support@bravelittleones.com with the following information:

Name (first & last)

Order number (6 digits found in your confirmation email)

Email address

Description of claim (lost, stolen or damaged)

Photo(s) if applicable

 

Exclusions:

International deliveries

Products damaged by user error

Products destroyed by pets

Discolored/stained products

Orders without proof of purchase from us or an approved retailer

Please Note: Brave Little Ones reserves the right to reject replacements and compensation at any time. Claim assessments will take place on an individual basis. Abuse of services (multiple claims filed) will result in the removal of one’s purchasing privileges with Brave Little Ones LLC.

settings.mainText: Our Brave Little Ones $0.98 Package Protection guarantees delivery on all orders placed within the United States.

settings.heading: Size Chart
settings.content:
Need sizing help? See our size chart here. 

Our zip rompers fit true to size. It is recommended to size up one size in two-piece sets for longer wear.

settings.heading: How do your product sizing run?
settings.content:
Our zip rompers fit true to size. 

It is recommended to size up one size in two-piece sets for longer wear.

settings.heading: What is my little one is in between sizes?
settings.content:
If your little one is in-between sizes, we always go by the weight section on our size chart. 

If you little one is at the end of that weight we recommend sizing up.

settings.mainText: Our Brave Little Ones $0.98 Package Protection guarantees delivery on all orders placed within the United States.

settings.heading: Slight variation in fit or color?
settings.content:
Brave Little Ones pjs are very stretchy, and sewn by human hands. A small sewing variance from item to item is normal. While we aim to keep our sizing as consistent as possible, there will always be slight variation.

Similarly, we do our absolute best to ensure our colors remain consistent. However, we custom dye and print our fabric, so there may be slight variations between batches. Print and pattern placement may also vary between pieces.

settings.heading: How do I care for bamboo?
settings.content:
Step One: 
Turn the garment inside out before washing and drying.

Step Two: 
Wash in cold water on the normal or quick cycle. We do not recommend washing on delicate since it makes products sit in water for too long.

Step Three: 
Dry on the normal heat setting.

settings.heading: How can I limit pilling?
settings.content:
Bamboo is a natural fiber, and it's delicate. When bamboo is rubbed against rough surfaces, especially while wet, it may cause pilling. It should be washed separately from items that may be damaging, like jeans, towels or velcro. 

For the longest wear, you can wash them inside out and line dry when possible.

settings.heading: How do I apply?
settings.content:
Are you interested in carrying Brave Little Ones in your shop? Brave Little Ones is the perfect addition to your shop. The best part is every Brave Little Ones purchase helps feed children in Rwanda, Africa. 

Please fill out the application here. If accepted, you will receive an email with our wholesale pricing and login information. We're excited to hear from you!

Please note: We are currently NOT selling to online retailers. Please only apply if you have a brick and mortar shop.

settings.heading: How does Sezzle work?
settings.content:
We offer the option to buy now and pay later with Sezzle. When you choose Sezzle at checkout, you can split your purchase into 4 equal, 0% interest installment payments--with no additional fees.

To learn more about Sezzle, click here.

settings.heading: How does ShopPay Installments work?
settings.content:
Shop Pay gives you the option to pay in full at checkout, or to pay for your order over time. Depending on your purchase amount, there are two ways that you can pay for your order in installments:

1. For orders between $50 to $999.99 USD, you can split your purchase into four bi-weekly, interest-free installment payments. 

2. For orders between $150 to 17,500 USD, you can split your purchase into monthly installment payments. 

To learn more about ShopPay Installments, Click Here

settings.heading: Other Questions?

settings.text: For more questions, please reach out to our support team at Support@bravelittleones.com. All inquires will be reponded to within 2 business days (Monday - Friday)
